metadata.title: Full Moon Decor Black Shower Curtain Fantasy Night Scenery Sea Water,70x70 Inch Waterproof Polyester Fabric Bathroom Accessories Curtains with 12pcs Hooks
features: PRODUCT:This dreamy full moon shower curtain is made of soft polyester fabric.70" W x 70"H/180CMx180CM.

SIMPLE and STYLISH:Using advanced high-definition printing technology to make the pattern color bright, clear and true, cheerful and vivid, not only allows you to enjoy a happy bathing time, but also can bring a different visual experience.

MULTIPURPOSE CURTAIN:This fantasy ocean night scenery shower curtain is suitable for all styles of traditional or country farmhouse bathrooms. It can be used in the main bathroom, guest bathroom, children's bathroom or basement bathroom. It can also be used in apartments, apartments, hotels, campers, dormitories and school showers, sports clubs, stadiums and other places. Provide privacy and decorative effects.

EASY TO INSTALL AND CLEAN:Each shower curtain set is equipped with hooks and metal grommets. The hook is flexible, easy to install and slide, and will not damage the curtain. Can be used with straight or curved shower rods.Machine washable or hand washable.Iron at low temperature, do not bleach or expose to the sun.
SERVICE: If you have any issue upon receiving the item, please contact us immediately. We will respond within 24 hours and make sure your issue is well taken care of.
description: Including packaging: 1x shower curtain + hook. SIZE: 70" W x 70"H/180CMx180CM. Product features: made of polyester. Using bronzing and soft printing technology, combined with the design of popular elements, decorate your bathroom, bright and pleasant, and provide you with a wonderful life experience. Give your parents, relatives and friends the perfect decoration with various colors and various patterns or pictures (such as fields, forests, animals, plants) and all the wonderful, popular, classic, crazy, symbolic paintings and all Similar patterns. It adds real value to your bathroom decoration and is definitely a great choice for a bathroom shower. We do our best to create high-quality products for you. However, due to some uncontrollable reasons, a certain degree of measurement error and chromatic aberration are allowed. Care instructions: machine wash and hand wash below 30Â°C, gentle cycle, do not bleach, dry at low temperature.
